Moments after, Dreadplague transforms to chopper mode and leaves the
base to enter the vast sky outside.

Dreadplague: Is there a place where our skills can be used?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel: Sure. That's better then sitting around here doing
nothing. Beast mode!
> Darkangel transformes to his bat mode and flies out of the entrence.
>  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:She smiled.
> 
> Dread: I'm much better thanks to you! Would you like to accompany me
> on a scouting patrol?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Darkangel : :
> > Darkangel heard Dreadplague over the comm and opend a return channel.
> > Darkangel: I'm here Dread. Are you ok now?
> >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Dreadplague opened her comm unit.
> > 
> > Dread: Darkangel, this is Dread, do you read?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Dreadplague opened her eyes and pushed the canopy of the CR chamber.
> > > She looked around and searched for Darkangel or her father. She saw
> > > none and went to the bridge. She looked at the global scanners
and saw
> > > that the Rust was still quite active. However, with so few metal to
> > > devour, it wouldn't last long.
> > > 
> > > Dreadplague: No matter how that distresses the Maximals, I'll make
> > > them run with their tail between their legs. What a wonderful
> prospect!
> >
